name: F.A.T.E.
description:
F.A.T.E is a first person experience where you play as a intership operator. Your job is to maintain earth in control.

This game is part of the GMTK Jam 2020.

Inputs:

WASD / Left Analog - to move around

Left Mouse Button / Right Trigger - to interact

Team

Artur Lizi - 3D artist and Environment Designer

ArtStation

Felipe Dermann - Game Designer

Itch.io

Lucas Mello - Game Designer,  Sound Designer and Coding

Itch.io

Mateus Dalosto - Coding

Itch.io

Good luck and remember that fate is at our hands!
